cause.description:
You get the general idea. This cause is basically campaigning for Welsh people to do whatever they like with Sheep, but also allowing me to do whatever i want too.
1. Sheep molestation isn't as bad as everyone makes it out to be
2. People should be able to do it if they want
3. I want to do it. Any other reason needed?
cause.mission: Give people the choice whether they molest animals or not
cause.name: Sheep Molestation is not a crime!
